io.spine.server.commandbus

Class CommandBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.bus.Bus<T,E,C,D>
      • io.spine.server.bus.UnicastBus<io.spine.core.Command,io.spine.core.CommandEnvelope,io.spine.core.CommandClass,CommandDispatcher<?>>
        • io.spine.server.commandbus.CommandBus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class CommandBus
extends UnicastBus<io.spine.core.Command,io.spine.core.CommandEnvelope,io.spine.core.CommandClass,CommandDispatcher<?>>
    Dispatches the incoming commands to the corresponding handler.

      • prepareObserver

        protected io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<io.spine.core.Ack> prepareObserver(java.lang.Iterable<io.spine.core.Command> commands,
                                                                         io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<io.spine.core.Ack> source)
        Prepares the given StreamObserver in order to post messages into this bus.

        This method is an extension point of a Bus.

        When posting messages into the bus, the message acknowledgements are passed to the observer created by this method.

        Conventionally, the resulting StreamObserver should delegate calls to the source observer, so that the caller receives the posting outcome. If violating this convention, the Bus implementation should specify the altered behavior explicitly.

        The messages can be used in order to construct the observer. The resulting observer is used only for acknowledgment of the given messages.

        By default, this method returns the source observer. See Bus subclasses for the altered behavior specification.

        Wraps the source observer with the CommandAckMonitor.

        Overrides:
        prepareObserver in class Bus<io.spine.core.Command,io.spine.core.CommandEnvelope,io.spine.core.CommandClass,CommandDispatcher<?>>
        Parameters:
        commands - the messages to create an observer for
        source - the source StreamObserver to be transformed
        Returns:
        new instance of CommandAckMonitor with the given parameters

      • dispatch

        protected void dispatch(io.spine.core.CommandEnvelope envelope)
        Description copied from class: Bus
        Passes the given envelope for dispatching.

        Finds and invokes the MessageDispatcher(s) for the given message.

        This method assumes that the given message has passed the filtering.

        Specified by:
        dispatch in class Bus<io.spine.core.Command,io.spine.core.CommandEnvelope,io.spine.core.CommandClass,CommandDispatcher<?>>
        See Also:
        for the public API

      • getRegisteredCommandClasses

        public java.util.Set<io.spine.core.CommandClass> getRegisteredCommandClasses()
        Obtains the view Set of commands that are known to this CommandBus.

        This set is changed when command dispatchers or handlers are registered or un-registered.

        Returns:
        a set of classes of supported commands
